head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NOLAN, RICHARD E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NOLAN, RICHARD E.

block.p: NOLAN-Richard E., on May 22nd, 2000 after a long illness. Beloved husband of Agnes. Devoted father of Anthony, Christopher, Timothy, Mariana and Katherine. Beloved brother of Eileen Solimano. Dear grandfather of Samuel, Theodore and Lillian. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81 St., Wednesday and Thursday, 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial, St. Thomas More Church, 65 E. 89 St., NYC, on Friday, 10:30 AM. Interment private.
